text: 13:2-3 Dɨboboniba 22:1-6Ezɨ Israelia akar akɨnafarir kamɨn aven itim baregha, gumazamizir men ameboghfeziaba God gɨfozir puvatɨziba, me me batosi. Egha me ghaze, me ua Israelian gumazamizibar tongɨn ikian kogham. Akɨnafarir kamɨn mɨngarim kamaghɨn: Dughiar Israelia Isip ategha izimɨn, Amonia ko Moapia dagheba ko dɨpataba me ganɨngizir puvatɨ. Egha gumazir kaba akam inigha izir gumazim Balam givese, eghtɨ a God mɨkemeghtɨ a Israelia gasɨghasɨgham. Ezɨ God Balamɨn akam gɨrazɨ, a kamaghɨn mɨkemezir pu. Puvatɨ. Balam ghaze, God deragh me damuam.
